sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; const featuredMentors = [ { id: 1, name: 'Sarah Johnson', expertise: ['React', 'Node.js', 'MongoDB'], experience: '5+ years', rating: 4.8, imageUrl: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1494790108377-be9c29b29330?ixlib=rb-1.2.1&auto=format&fit=facearea&facepad=2&w=256&h=256&q=80', bio: 'Full-stack developer passionate about mentoring', }, { id: 5, name: 'Lisa Wang', expertise: ['Data Science', 'Python', 'TensorFlow'], experience: '8+ years', rating: 5.0, imageUrl: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1517841905240-472988babdf9?ixlib=rb-1.2.1&auto=format&fit=facearea&facepad=2&w=256&h=256&q=80', bio: 'AI researcher helping others break into ML', }, { id: 9, name: 'Maria Garcia', expertise: ['System Design', 'Java', 'Spring'], experience: '10+ years', rating: 5.0, imageUrl: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1489424731084-a5d8b219a5bb?ixlib=rb-1.2.1&auto=format&fit=facearea&facepad=2&w=256&h=256&q=80', bio: 'Senior architect specializing in scalable systems', } ]; function FeaturedMentors() { return (

Featured Mentors

Learn from industry experts who are passionate about helping others succeed

{featuredMentors.map((mentor) => (

{mentor.name}

{mentor.experience} experience

{mentor.bio}

{mentor.expertise.map((skill) => ( {skill} ))}
{mentor.rating}
View Profile
))}
View All Mentors
); } export default FeaturedMentors;
